inclusion.criterion: Symptomatic while on optimal medical therapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Refusal to sign the informed consent
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Dementia or neurological disorders that prevent the proper use of the tablet
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Inability to use the tablet, the sensors and/or the wearables, even with the assistance of family members
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: End-stage chronic kidney disease on dialysis
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, but is now prepared to undergo surgery. EF of 65% on TTE.
